Description.Text: Surrey hotel is on the prestigious upper east side of Manhatten. The Surrey Hotel is a classically elegant suite hotel located in the exclusive Upper East Side of New York. A favorite of sophisticated travelers and international guests seeking a tranquil retreat, the Surrey Hotel is set among stately townhouses and is convenient to Madison Avenue boutiques, renowned museums and scenic Central Park.

• Central Park - 0.5 block • Fifth Avenue - 0.5 block • Whitney Museum of American Art - 1.5 blocks • Metropolitan Museum of Art - 4 blocks • Guggenheim Museum - 12 blocks • Cooper-Hewitt Design Museum - 13 blocks • Jewish Museum - 15 blocks • Rockefeller Center - 0.75 mile • Times Square 1.25 miles
• 132 suites in a 16-story building opened in 1929 • A small fitness room contains five cardio machines and free weights
• Ice skating • Aerobics • Running track/path • Racquetball/squash • Tennis • Horse riding
• All Major credit cards are accepted. • Check In Time - 4 p.m. & Check Out Time - 3 p.m.

Renowned Chef Daniel Boulud’s Café Boulud combines the best of classic French cooking, regional specialties and world cuisine. This highly rated restaurant has earned praise from The New York Times and some of the most respected food critics in the country.
